script: Fast Start is your golden window to earn extra rewards right away. It’s your first 60 days — and every activity counts double: customer bonuses, team growth, and incentives. Focus on supported appointments, keep your activity consistent, and hit your goals early!

Your Fast Start Action Plan: 1) Speak to 3 people a day. 2) Book 10 supported appointments in your first 2 weeks. 3) Use your leader — don’t try to be the expert. 4) Follow the Tracker. Stick to this and you’re on track for bonuses and belief.

Qualified Distributor (QD) means you’ve got 3 customers and 1 active partner. It’s your first leadership rank. Hit this and you unlock ongoing residual income and a more exciting compensation level. Most partners hit this within their first 30–60 days.

To reach QD*, help your new partner get 3 customers. Think teamwork. As you support their growth, you unlock yours. This is where duplication begins, and your business starts growing beyond just your personal effort.

You don’t have to know everything. You just have to start. Action builds belief. And belief builds momentum. Let’s focus on your first win together — book that first appointment, and I’ll do the rest with you.
